person_say: I'm studying in a noisy environment and it's hard to focus. Can you help me find a way to concentrate better?
animal_say: Noisy environments can be distracting! How do you usually feel when you try to focus? Any techniques you’ve tried?

person_say: I usually feel frustrated when I try to focus in a noisy environment. I haven't really tried any specific techniques yet. What do you suggest?
animal_say: Frustration is tough! There's a calming bear named Bruno who specializes in relaxation techniques. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds great! I would love to learn some relaxation techniques from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bruno will help you find some peaceful relaxation techniques to conquer that noise. Let’s go see him!
